name: Qiú (FatSheepStudio)
description:
“Can you image a platform game where you don´t control the character, if not the world itself? Stop imaging and play QIÚ. Immerse yourself in this arcade world by travelling through different scenarios and avoiding diverse obstacles".

•VARIOUS WORLDS: Explore all kinds of scenarios that you can control throughout the game. Starting in the world of minigolf and ends up in a recreational room, bouncing through multiple obstacles of pinball among many other worlds.

•DIFFERENT CHARACTERS: Unlock different types of balls to move around in your own way, you can bounce more, jump more, weigh more, or just let you roll.

•FLUIDITY AND REWARDS: Be quick!. Wins stars to unlock new ways to play. The faster you pass the levels, the more rewards you will get. 

If you have problems or doubts, contact with us:

Twitter: https://twitter.com/FatSheepStudio

E-Mail: FatSheep2019@gmail.com

WebSite: https://fatsheep2019.wixsite.com/website2019

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

TO PLAY THE GAME:

1. Unzip the folder with the name QIU

2. Open de folder with the name QIU

3. Double click in the .exe "QIU"

4. ENJOY the game!!!
